hi, i've had the same problem and created a simple php function :

https://h2openxml.codeplex.com/

use it to convert your html to openxml, then you can use the setValue function.

Feel free to add content to it, for now it can only do some HTML styles (bold, italic, underlined, and bullet lists)

i will add more with time
